result.arabic_text: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
result.translation: (53) Did they suggest it to them?[1547] Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.
result.footnotes: [1547]- i.e., Did the former disbelievers pass on these words to the Makkans so that they repeat the same expressions?
